data.title: Grand Island Casino Resort
data.meta_description: Grand Island Casino Resort  information page: This casino is located in Grand Island, Nebraska. Grand Island Casino Resort  features 300 gaming machines and 8 table games for your entertainment. WCD also books hotel rooms in the major casino resorts in Grand Island. You can browse our pictures of Grand Island Casino Resort  or read recent headlines about Grand Island Casino Resort  on our site. There is also a message forum all about Grand Island Casino Resort .
data.text:
Grand Island Casino Resort Review

2022 Updates: Grand Island Casino Resort temporary non-smoking facility opened on Dec. 27, 2022, and is located in the concourse of Fonner Park adjacent to the Van Berg Racing Collection and the Nebraska Thoroughbred Racing Hall of Fame. The interim casino features slots, table games, including electronic table games, sports betting, horse betting kiosks, simulcasting, a snack bar, bar and restaurant and Elite Casino's Resort Club.

Work on the permanent Grand Island Casino Resort began after the 2023 Nebraska State Fair ended on Sept. 5th. The project is expected to take two years to complete with the opening date sometime in 2025.

Elite Casino Restorts, LLC has been chosen to operate the planned Grand Island Casino Resort at Fonner Park horse racing track in the city of Grand Island in central Nebraska. Plans for the property include a five-story 116-room hotel with an indoor and outdoor pool, full-service spa and salon, a range of dining options, including a rooftop Ruthie’s Steak and Seafood, and a show lounge that will play host to live entertainment on the weekend.

The casino floor will connect to the existing Fonner Park structure, and feature 650 slot machines, with the ability to increase that number by an additional 200 positions, as well as 20 table games, a VIP lounge and a high limit slots area, and a sports bar with a sportsbook.

Already responsible for a trio of gaming and resort destinations in Iowa, including in Iowa City, Davenport, and Larchwood, and a recently opened casino resort in Southern Illinois. Elite Casino Resorts expects the Grand Island, Nebraska property to be completed in 2023.

Gaming at Grand Island Casino Resort

Grand Island Casino Resort's temporary casino offers about 300 reel and video slots, including those at Draft Day bar and restaurant, as well as electronic Roulette and Blackjack, and eight table games including Blackjack with Trilux, Craps, Ultimate Texas Hold'em and Roulette. The table games area has plenty of high definition TVs and comfortable seating so you can relax while watching your favorite sporting events. Guests can also place wagers at live windows or at self-serve kiosks at ELITE Sportsbook at Draft Day, where you can also grab a bite to eat, enjoy a drink and watch the game on the big screen. while you are here and watch your favorite team on our big screen.

The permanent resort's 37,000 square foot gaming floor will feature around 650 slots, 20 table games, including live table games, and a sports book.

Restaurants

In addition to Ruthie's, Grand Island Casino Resort will reportedly include three other food options.

General

Price range: Average

Ruthie’s Steak and Seafood

Serving: Seafood, Steakhouse

Planned.

A high-end American steakhouse, Ruthie's Steak and Seafood sources the finest cuts of beef and seafood, with guests choosing from traditional steaks or chops of beef, lamb or pork prepared as cuts or on the bone. Favorites include Rutihie's signature line of steaks such as the filet marmalade, Maryland ribeye or, the French onion filet. They also serve some of the best sautéed or grilled fish and seafood dishes around. Chilean sea bass, wild-caught salmon, Australian lobster tail, and Argentinian red shrimp are all on the menu.

An impressive wine selection complements.

General

Price range: Average

Draft Day

Serving: Bar/Pub

Currently open at the temporary Grand Island Casino Resort facility, Draft Day bar and restaurant serves local beers and appetizers/sharables, breakfast items, pizza, sandwiches, burgers and more. In addition to tasty food and drinks, the lively venue has HDTVs, so you won't miss any of the games, and slots. Check with management for hours.

General

Price range: Average

Reservations: (308) 382-4515

Alcohol: Full Bar

Ambience: Casual

Attire: Casual

Grand Island Casino Resort Attractions & Entertainment

Fonner Park

Race Track

A Grand Island staple since the 1950s, Fonner Park is a thoroughbred horse racing facility that is open year-round. In addition to live horse racing, the 220-acre Fonner Park Complex hosts national livestock shows, the Hall County Fair, and the Nebraska State Fair. Annual events including concerts, entertainment, sports and athletic events, conventions, and trade shows are held in the Heartland Events Center’s Eihusen Arena. Located adjacent to the Eihusen Arena, the Bosselman Conference Center provides has facilities for meetings, wedding receptions, and banquets.

Adjoining facilities include the Fonner Park Race Track and nearly 500,000 sq. ft. of exhibition, livestock, and equine facilities, which are utilized for the Nebraska State Fair and throughout the year.

Fonner Park's live thoroughbred race meet runs from mid-February through early May. During live meets, visitors can enjoy craft shows, a variety of family activities, recreational shows and special races. Fonner Park also streams live horse racing from all across the U.S. in the Finish Line Restaurant.
